```{r eval=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(reactable)
library(htmltools)

table <- jsonlite::fromJSON("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jaidenpopowski/jaidenpopowski.github.io/main/data/aflw/aflw_test_2023.json") %>% 
  as.data.frame()

reactable(
  table[,-c(1)],
  defaultSorted = c("Disposals","Games"),
  defaultSortOrder = "desc",
  showSortIcon = FALSE,
  showPageSizeOptions = TRUE,
  striped = TRUE,
  pageSizeOptions = c(20, 50, 100),
  defaultPageSize = 20,
  columns = list(
    Player = colDef(
      name = "Player",
      sticky = "left",
      defaultSortOrder = "asc",
      cell=function(value,index){
        image <- img(src = table$image[index], style = "height: 24px;vertical-align:middle")
        tagList(
          div(style = "vertical-align:bottom;",image,paste0(" ",value))
        )},
      width = 300
    ),
    Team = colDef(
      width = 140
    )
  )
) #%>% reactablefmtr::save_reactable_test(output = "test_table.html")
```

```{r eval=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(reactable)
library(htmltools)

table <- jsonlite::fromJSON("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/jaidenpopowski/jaidenpopowski.github.io/main/data/aflw/aflw_test_2023.json") %>% 
  as.data.frame() %>% 
  mutate(image = paste0('<img src="',image,'" style = "height: 24px; vertical-align: middle;">'))

reactable(
  table,
  defaultSorted = c("Disposals","Games"),
  defaultSortOrder = "desc",
  showSortIcon = FALSE,
  showPageSizeOptions = TRUE,
  striped = TRUE,
  wrap = FALSE,
  pageSizeOptions = c(20, 50, 100),
  defaultPageSize = 20,
  columns = list(
    image = colDef(
      name = "",
      sticky = "left",
      sortable = FALSE,
      filterable = FALSE,
      searchable = FALSE,
      html = TRUE
    ),
    Player = colDef(
      name = "Player",
      sticky = "left",
      defaultSortOrder = "asc"
    ),
    Team = colDef(
      defaultSortOrder = "asc"
    )
  )
) #%>% reactablefmtr::save_reactable_test(output = "test_table.html")
```
